data.text:
Pon Ondru Kanden

Siva and Sai, two middle-aged bachelors, come across each other at their school reunion and remember their mutual rivalry. However, as they decide to bury the hatchet, both of them end up liking the same woman, Sandy. What has fate in store for them?
